reuters.title: ELDERS RESOURCES ISSUE TO RAISE 161 MLN DLRS
reuters.body: <Elders Resources Ltd> said its two-for-seven convertible unsecured notes issue will raise 161.32 mln dlrs for group expansion and development. The 46.99 pct-owned Elders IXL Ltd <ELXA.S> offshoot announced the issue at 2.50 dlrs each with its first-half results statement. The group lifted net earnings to 16.93 mln dlrs in the half ended December 31 from 5.47 mln a year earlier when it was still in its formative stages. The 8.0 pct notes are convertible to one share on May 1 and November 1 of each year from next November. Reuter 
